Text: Ignore this torrent and download the original release here: http://www.apple.com/itunes

I agree with whybother-: Ignore this one! Get it @ the source.

Download speed is never an issue with Apple's servers. I dl'd my copy at 1,6 Mb/s.

The only reason I put this up was because I was having problems with the download speed from Apple's servers - might have been a localised issue. The torrent's still available if anyone experiences any issues.
It sure helped me tonight. Not everyone is looking to update, Maybe some need to revert back ;)
